## Loading the data

```{r, message=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
filteredCont <- contributions %>%
  filter(state == "AZ") %>%
  mutate()
glimpse(filteredCont)
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
filteredCom <- committees %>%
  filter(state == "AZ") %>%
  mutate()
glimpse(filteredCont)
```
